Package dungeon.model.items.mobs

Class Summary
Creature Class representing a creature
Derived classes are Orc and Ogre
Faction Class to hold information about a mob faction.
Hero The user-controlled hero mob
Mob Abstract class to represent any mobile item in the dungeon
Derived classes are Hero and Creature
Movement Holds keyboard movement requests
Ogre An ogre; stronger and tougher than an orc, but slower
Orc An orc; relatively easy to kill
